AI-powered voice agents and conversation: AI-powered voice agents and conversational interfaces.
\nFollow these steps to obtain your Kall:
Follow these steps to obtain your Kallbot API Key:

1. Go to [Kallabot](https://kallabot.com/) and log in to your account.
2. Click on your profile picture in the top right corner.
3. Select **Settings** from the dropdown menu.
4. Navigate to the **API & Integrations** tab.
5. Copy the generated API key and paste it here.
Initiate an outbound call using an AI vo: Initiate an outbound call using an AI voice agent.
Retrieve details of a specific call by c: Retrieve details of a specific call by call SID.
Select the agent to make the call.
The phone number to call in E.164 format: The phone number to call in E.164 format (e.g., +1234567890).
Select the phone number to send the call: Select the phone number to send the call from.
Variables to replace placeholders in age: Variables to replace placeholders in agent prompts. Only required if your agent prompts contain variables in {{variable.name}} format. Example: if prompt has {{customer.name}}, provide {"customer": {"name": "John"}}
Optional webhook URL to receive call com: Optional webhook URL to receive call completion events. Use this for "Respond and Wait for Next Webhook" flows.
The unique identifier of the call.
Receives webhook data when call events o: Receives webhook data when call events occur from Kallabot AI agents.
**Setup Instructions:**\n1. Copy the web:
**Setup Instructions:**
1. Copy the webhook URL below.
2. In your Kallabot AI agent configuration, go to Actions/Webhooks settings  .
3. Enable webhooks and paste the webhook URL.
4. Your agent will now send call data to this webhook when a call ends.
\n**Test URL:**\n\nIf you want to genera:
**Test URL:**

If you want to generate sample data without triggering the flow, append `/test` to your webhook URL.
